question1.text: What is the expected ROI of this innovation, and over what timeframe?
options: High ROI within 8 months
Moderate ROI within 12 months
ROI expected in 12-24 months
ROI difficult to quantify but strategic value evident
No clear ROI or financial benefit

question2.text: How easily can this innovation be integrated into existing CBRE operations or client environments?
options: Fully plug-and-play; no changes required
Minor adjustments needed; low effort integration
Moderate changes required; some process or system updates
Significant changes required; high effort integration
Not currently feasible without major transformation

question3.text: How does this innovation differentiate CBRE from competitors?
options: Unique and proprietary; no known competitors
Emerging innovation; few competitors currently using
Common in market but with a unique CBRE application
Similar to existing solutions; limited differentiation
No clear market advantage

question4.text: How does this innovation create measurable value for CBRE and its clients?
options: Strong value for both CBRE and clients (e.g. cost, ESG, satisfaction)
Primarily benefits CBRE operations
Primarily benefits client experience
Limited measurable value but aligns with strategic goals
No clear value identified
